Flow.description: 5/28 SC - Added Questionnaire Output update 5/21 AV - Made the delay on the delay screen a bit longer (3000 milliseconds).
Flow.label: SRLG | Questionnaire | Dynamic Screen Flow

fields.name: Message
fields.fieldText: Staging the questionnaire... Please remain still while we calibrate your impending judgement.

fields.name: DelayMessage
fields.fieldText: Saving your answers...

fields.name: DQMessage
fields.fieldText:
UNFORTUNATELY THEY ARE DQ

Please Read: "Unfortunately, we cannot accept your potential case at this time. As such, we are not able to represent you and will not be filing a lawsuit on your behalf. This does not mean you don't have a case. Please consider contacting another law firm for a second opinion. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us as Saddle Rock Legal Group. Have a great day!"


**Note to Agent: If the caller asked 'why', it's okay to simply state that 'There's a current lack of evidence to fit our case criteria.' No further details than that.

fields.name: FinishedMessage
fields.fieldText:
Questionnaire Completed


If you would like to restart from the beginning please click Relaunch below

fields.name: RequiredQuestionsText
fields.fieldText: You have required Questions that are unanswered that must be completed before continuing.

subflows.description: This will create the Answer records needed on the Intake to run this flow
subflows.name: Create_Answer_Records
subflows.label: Create Answer Records
